parameters.subject: Ad Hoc Product Created on Noir Platform
parameters.html:
=
Hi Aditya,


PFA the list of ad hoc products that has been created on Mini Mozart platform. As per our process, I kindly request your assistance in notifying the catalogue team to catalogue the newly added product.

Thank you for your cooperation and swift attention to this matter.

Best regards,

Team ShakeDeal
